name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 14, Kunshan, Jiangsu. Netizens posted a video saying that the house price of Kunshan Cuican Jingyuan real estate has dropped by millions in less than a year, and the owners gathered at the sales office to defend their rights.
The police shouted at the owners who were defending their rights: "You are gathering at the door and shouting slogans, which violates the Public Security Administration Law. If you don't leave, we will force you to disperse."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 15 (Release) Guangdong. An Ideal L9 was reported to have a car accident on the highway. The A-pillar was completely broken, but the airbag did not pop out. The rescue system on the car was useless, and the owner had to call 120 himself.
The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 15, in Nenjiang, Heilongjiang, the driver saw the taxi he depended on for survival suddenly caught fire. He was so anxious that he broke down and cried for help from passers-by: "Is there anyone? Help me." The surrounding citizens helped put out the fire with fire extinguishers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of December 15, in Yuxi, Yunnan, a large number of Muslims gathered in front of the Yuxi Municipal Government to show their support for the police who took away the local imam Ma Yuwei from a restaurant that day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 15, Ma Xiangyu, a staff member of Suzhou Commerce Bureau, reported the director of the Commerce Bureau in his real name, and finally got a result. Ma Xiangyu was retaliated against for a long time and his file was smeared because he was unwilling to participate in bid rigging and setting up fictitious projects to siphon funds. He reported to Suzhou Discipline Inspection Commission and Supervision Commission in March 2023, but there was still no result one year and four months after the formal acceptance. In July this year, Ma Xiangyu filmed a video to report in his real name. In the end, the director of the Commerce Bureau was dismissed and demoted to a regular section chief, kept on probation within the party, and fined three glasses of wine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: He was reported for suspected profiteering of 17 million yuan. After investigation, it was found that at least 8.5 million projects had problems. He also smeared people's files and destroyed the future of righteous people who did not want to go along with the corrupt officials. The final result was that he was demoted from a director to a section chief, placed on probation for one year within the Party, and fined three cups of wine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 14, Xi'an Xiying Road, an Ideal car owner's system suddenly upgraded while driving, and he was stuck on the road for more than 40 minutes and could not move.
The owner said: He was driving normally on Xiying Road, and suddenly the entertainment screen in the car went black and the car stopped. There was no response when he stepped on the brakes, the gears could not be changed, and even the car door could not be opened. It was so scary.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The owner of the car was trapped in the car for 40 minutes because the door could not be opened after the vehicle was shut down for upgrading.
He called the customer service and was told that the system was being upgraded and apologized.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December Luoyang? A netizen posted a video of an old lady singing and scolding corrupt officials in a service hall on a video website. The song goes: Bank vaults are stolen by corrupt officials, beauties are taken over by corrupt officials, some people say Luoyang is beautiful, but you haven't seen the dark side, the image of the ancient capital is polluted by corrupt officials.
There was constant cheering and applause at the scene.
The comments also called this old lady a well-deserved people's artist and called for her to be on the Spring Festival Gala.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Only ten days after the video was released, it received 42,000 likes and more than 7,000 coins based on 250,000 views, making it one of the rare videos with high likes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 15, the founder of Shanghai Tangning Bookstore released a video saying that it was closed due to external pressure. The founder said: Because a foreign client took a fancy to the current building of Tangning Bookstore, No. 8 Bridge Property Management tore up the already signed renewal contract and forced Tangning Bookstore to close and move immediately. On the 13th of this month, No. 8 Bridge Property Management organized more than a dozen people to rush into the bookstore that was operating normally, forcibly posted a notice of the bookstore's closure, and threatened to cut off water and electricity, forcing it to move within three days without compensation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 11, Ruzhou City, Henan Province A girl reported that Yang Hengtong, the party secretary of the town health center, had an affair during marriage. He concealed the fact that he was married, claimed that he was single, and established a relationship with the victim, causing her to become pregnant. He also forced her to have an abortion, which caused heavy bleeding and led to the removal of her uterus. He then beat the victim, forced her to break up, and threatened the victim: He had someone above him and could kill the victim in a minute. The victim's friend said that she had gone to the police station several times before but it was useless, so she spoke out on Douyin to protect her rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, Xi Jinping went to Macau. All the passages in and out of Zhuhai Hengqin were set up with checkpoints. Trucks were not allowed to enter, and small cars needed to take photos of their faces, which seriously affected the lives of residents.
A driver complained in Gaode chat room, "What does the government want? The economy is so bad, but it still wants to harm us ordinary people." The chat room was then closed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 13th is the National Memorial Day for the Victims of the Nanjing Massacre. Several Chinese waved the five-star national flag at the Oshino Hakkai Observatory at the foot of Mount Fuji.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 10, a drunk man broke into a female dormitory in Shanghai Lida Academy and tried to enter by knocking on the door. He broke the door. It was reported online that the man also forcefully kissed a female student, strangled her neck, and broke her fingers.
Afterwards, the victim was threatened by the school to delete the video with punishment. The school warned not to spread the video to the Internet, otherwise it would be severely punished.
It was reported online that the victim was eventually punished by the school for calling the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some students later called the school's Academic Affairs Office to inquire about the handling of the incident, but the Academic Affairs Office said they were not aware of the specific circumstances. They also said that the punishment for the girl who called the police was not issued by the Academic Affairs Office, but by the Student Affairs Office, so they were not aware of it either.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A reporter asked the university office, and the office responded: They don’t know the specific situation. The police have already intervened in the investigation, but it is not convenient to disclose the specific situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, Jiyue CEO Xia Yiping issued a long apology, saying that he had made many mistakes as a CEO and felt deeply sorry for employees, car owners, suppliers and even shareholders.
In the article, he said that he had made many mistakes as a CEO, did not do a good job in strategy and financing, and paid too much attention to details and micro-management.
He reiterated that he did not run away, and in the most difficult days, he paid out of his own pocket to protect the rights and interests of some employees who needed it most.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 16, Changchun Futeng Guantianxia Phase I has not been delivered for 17 months, and the owners are forced to pool their money to buy doors and install them, and temporarily move into the unfinished rough housing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In 2016, Xi Jinping had a cordial exchange with villagers at the home of Chen Zeshen, a villager in Dawan Village, Lu'an, Anhui.
Nowadays, Chen Zeshen's home has become a tourist attraction, and many tourists come here to check in and take photos.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 15, a woman posted on Xiaohongshu, describing how she was forcibly detained in a mental hospital for defending her rights. The woman said that she was cheated by her boyfriend and then insulted by his father. After posting the incident on the Internet, she was forcibly tied up and sent to a mental hospital, where she was detained for nearly 20 days. During this period, she was "forcibly held down by male medical staff and had her pants removed" and "her limbs were forcibly tied when she entered the hospital." Before she was discharged, she was threatened by the director not to call the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, three Bilibili videos about songs about corrupt officials were all removed

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Sino-Pakistani co-production "Pakistani Girl" will be released on December 16. This is the first co-production between the two countries. The film tells the story of a Chinese girl helping a Pakistani Muslim girl escape the fate of marrying at the age of 13 and pursue her football dream. The drama includes a plot in which a Chinese girl points a gun at the girl's original family to prevent the girl from marrying. There are also plots in which the Chinese are given free items and the Chinese girl is praised as amazing at the end, which reflects the "friendship" between China and Pakistan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Coincidentally, on December 5, a man posted a video saying that his wife was about to give birth, but Ideal Auto was upgrading and had to wait for 51 minutes. Ideal customer service said: Exiting the upgrade may cause the car to not work properly. In the end, the blogger had no choice but to walk to the gate of the community with his wife dilated by one finger and took a taxi to the hospital. Afterwards, the blogger said that because of the few steps he walked, the umbilical cord of his child was wrapped around his neck and suffocated, so he had to have a caesarean section. Ideal was playing a joke on the lives of his wife and child.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 9, the Hong Kong Food and Environmental Hygiene Department announced that the ice cream sold by the Kowloon Bay branch of the mainland restaurant fufuland was found to contain 69,000 E. coli per gram and 1.2 million total bacteria per gram, exceeding the legal limit by 690 and 24 times respectively.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 16 Netizen contribution: Hui people in Yuxi, Yunnan Province, are still gathering in front of the government to show their support. A large number of police patrolled and set up checkpoints at the scene. Some main roads in Yuxi were heavily congested today.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 15, a woman from Beigouxi Village, Fangzi District, Weifang City, was threatened for filming a video to defend her rights because her demolition payment was missing. The woman said: Someone threatened her that because she said the government was bad in the video, the district party committee propaganda department, the street office and the public security department would look for her next. She spoke out because there was no response for nearly a month, and the village and the street office were passing the buck to each other. Finally, the woman asked: Don’t we ordinary people have the right to speak? And she was prepared to be wrongly accused.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 16 (Released) Tangshan, Hebei. The Internet exposed that private entrepreneur Yang Liguo encountered "nearshore fishing". During his detention, he was tortured by the case officers, including stepping on his face and forcing him to sing "Conquer". The article said that when the police were investigating the "Sun Jiuli series" cases, they found that Yang Liguo and his company had a large amount of property, so they linked the case to Yang Liguo. They also arrested Yang Liguo and several employees of the company, sealed up his company and property, and pieced together Yang Liguo and Sun Jiuli and others into a gang-related case with 20 defendants.
